text: in the dm editor there should be a quick way to delete the auto added closing tag, I know you can disable it in the settings, but i like it most the time, it's just the odd time I don't need it you have to delete a load of stuff that you didn't want, if hitting delete straight after an auto add deleted the tag that would be great
Adding on to that... could we get the auto-close to close on the same line as opposed to adding 2 additional lines?
